# Headlamp

> Headlamp is a Kubernetes web UI that provides a user-friendly interface for interacting with Kubernetes clusters. It is extensible via plugins and is part of the Kubernetes SIG UI family.

This file provides context for AI assistants to help with Headlamp core development. See `plugins/llms.txt` for plugin-specific context.

Key information and guidelines can be found in the main documentation files. The core logic is split between the frontend (React) and backend (Go).

- [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md): Guidelines for contributing to the project.
- [Development Guide](docs/development/index.md): Instructions for setting up the development environment and building Headlamp.
